name: E-goi
natural_language_description: 这是 E-goi 节点。主要用于: Consume E-goi API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: contact | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create | (必填项)
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many members

list.name: list
list.description: ID of list to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
list.natural_language_description: 参数名: List Name or ID | 作用: ID of list to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: Email address for subscriber

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | 作用: Contact ID of the subscriber

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: By default the response just includes the contact ID. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.
resolveData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resolve Data | 作用: By default the response just includes the contact ID. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically. | 默认值: True

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: birth_date (值: None) - Birth date of a subscriber
cellphone (值: None) - Cellphone of a subscriber
first_name (值: None) - Name of a subscriber
last_name (值: None) - Name of a subscriber
tagIds (值: None) - List of tag IDs to be added. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: birth_date (值: None) - Birth date of subscriber
email (值: None) - Email address for subscriber
tagIds (值: None) - List of tag IDs to be added. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

by.name: by
by.natural_language_description: 参数名: By | 作用: Search by | 默认值: id

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True
